verbs.description: [ARG0: House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy ( R - CA )] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [V: defended] [ARG1: investigations into President Donald Trump by the Republican - controlled House of Representatives] .
House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy ( R - CA ) on Sunday defended investigations into President Donald Trump by the [ARG0: Republican] - [V: controlled] [ARG1: House] of Representatives .
